title: Boston Red Sox average ticket price 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, containing a total of 13 data points.
Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2006 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2015, and finally slightly increasing from 2015 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, about 59.32 was reported at Year 2019
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 46.46 was reported at Year 2006
